file.string: Cannot capture photos. USB storage device space is less than 3 MB.
USB storage device is read-only. Please remove the write-protection and try again.
Photo capturing stopped because the USB storage device space is less than 3 MB. Please free space and try again.
Select [Give access] and then select [Allow] to begin using this app.

With this app, your TV camera will monitor and record your room. When something comes in front of your TV or anything moves, a TV camera automatically starts recording for 30 second while TV is on sleep or during standby.
Cannot start Smile Shutter. Please try again later.
Cannot record video. USB storage device space is less than 30 MB.
Cannot use Presence detector. Please connect USB storage device.
Presence detector is suspended. Please connect a camera.
This TV Camera app is available only when camera is connected to this TV.
Smile Shutter is suspended because the USB storage device space is less than 3 MB. Please free space and try again.
Make your TV watching experience memorable and exciting!
Presence detector is suspended. Please connect USB storage device.
Make your TV watching experience memorable and exciting!
Your actions will be captured by this application and displayed on TV.
Make the moment more memorable by storing your action video to USB storage device and cherish it forever.
TV camera needs to be purchased separately. Please call 4008109000 for product information, or scan QR code to get more information from Sony China website.
Set up the destination and video file format (size, bitrate) of recordings.
Smile Shutter is suspended. Please connect USB storage device.
Cannot use Smile Shutter. USB storage device space is less than 3 MB.
You can check recordings from Album app, or Video row in Content Bar.
** This feature is available only when your TV is inactive. Please select [TV Camera] from the Action Menu to set up this app.
* Recorded data will be saved in an external USB storage device and cannot be transferred from the TV via a network.
You can use Album app to watch taken videos. Album app can launched from Home menu or Content Bar.

To continue, %s needs your permission to access:
Camera is not properly activated. Please try again later.
Presence detector is suspended. USB storage device space is less than 50 MB.
Another app is using the camera. Stop running applications and try again.
When the selected face smiles, the camera automatically takes a photo.
Unknown error. Please try again later.
You can use Album app to see taken photos. Album app can launched from Home menu or Content Bar.
Presence detector is suspended. An error has occurred. Please try again later.
Use Smile Shutter™ technology to photograph a face just as it smiles.
The camera detects up to five faces and selects one face for smile detection and auto focus.
Smile Shutter is suspended. An error has occurred. Please try again later.
No more worries while you are away from your home.
Cannot start Smile Shutter. Please try again later.
Cannot capture photos. Please connect USB storage device.
Smile Shutter is suspended because a camera has been disconnected.

To get started, %s needs access to:

Presence detector has recorded a video.
You can use Album app to watch recorded videos and photos.
Using Smile Shutter™ to capture smiling faces
Cannot use Presence detector. Please connect a camera.
Recording has stopped because the USB storage space is less than 30 MB. Please free space and try again.
Cannot use Presence detector. USB storage device is read-only. Please remove the write-protection and try again.
To use Smile Shutter, you must turn the Smile Shutter setting on.
您能使用相册应用欣赏拍摄的视频及照片。
无法启动笑脸快门。请稍后再试。
USB 存储设备未插入，录像功能现在不可用。
设置 摄像/家庭安全摄像
其他应用程序正在使用摄像头。请停止应用程序，然后重试。
要使用笑脸快门，必须打开笑脸快门设置。
USB 存储空间不足 30 MB，录像已自动停止。请清理存储空间后重试。
无法使用笑脸快门功能。USB 存储设备空间少于 3 MB。
电视摄像机应用只有在插入摄像头后才能使用。
家庭安全摄像功能已停止。请连接摄像头。
摄像头需用户另行购买。具体产品信息您可拨打索尼客服热线4008109000或扫描屏幕中二维码进入索尼官网相关页面了解。
通过将您的动作视频存储到 USB 存储设备然后永久珍存起来，令这美好时刻更加难忘。
该应用程序将捕获您的动作并显示在电视上。
使您的电视观赏体验难忘刺激！
您能使用相册应用欣赏拍摄的视频。相册应用可以在主界面及内容条中启动。
该功能只在电视处于待机状态下才可用。您可以从快捷窗口中选择[电视摄像机]设置该功能。
支持的摄像头型号: CMU-BR300
拍摄的影像仅保存在您外接的 USB 存储设备中，索尼不会收集、保存、转发或使用这些拍摄的影像。
您可以通过电视机中的相册或视频应用来查看保存在您外接 USB 存储设备中的这些影像内容。
无法启动笑脸快门。请稍后再试。
当您离开家的时候，是否会担心家里的情况？
笑脸快门功能已停止。出现错误。请稍后再试。
选择 [编辑权限] > [权限] 授予权限。
要执行此操作，%s 需要您的权限来访问：
无法拍摄照片。请连接 USB 存储设备。
摄像头异常。请稍后再试。
设置 拍照/笑脸快门
家庭安全摄像功能已停止。请连接 USB 存储设备。
要继续，%s 需要您的权限来访问：
USB 存储设备已被拔出。
家庭安全摄像功能已停止。USB 存储设备空间少于 50 MB。
设置视频文件的格式（图像大小，清晰度及保存路径）。
无法启动笑脸快门。请稍后再试。
照片拍摄因 USB 存储设备空间少于 3 MB 而停止。请释放空间，然后重试。
启用该功能，当电视机处于待机状态时，电视机的摄像头会监测其拍摄范围内的移动物体，并自动拍摄记录30秒钟的影像。
不能录像。USB 存储空间低于 30 MB。

无法使用家庭安全摄像功能。请连接摄像头。
家庭安全摄像功能已录像。
选择 [授予访问权限]，然后选择 [允许] 开始使用此应用程序。
使用笑脸快门功能捕捉微笑的脸庞
使您的电视观赏体验难忘刺激！
无法使用家庭安全摄像功能。USB 存储设备只读。请关闭写保护后重试。

要开始体验，%s 需要访问:
无法拍摄照片。USB 存储设备空间少于 3 MB。
无法使用家庭安全摄像功能。请连接 USB 存储设备。
使用笑脸快门技术来记录微笑的瞬间。
照相机能探测出最多5个人脸，并从中选择一个作为笑脸追踪及自动对焦的目标。
当选择的人脸露出微笑，照相机会自动拍照。
您能使用相册应用欣赏拍摄的照片。相册应用可以在主界面及内容条中启动。
摄像头需用户另行购买。具体产品信息您可拨打索尼客服热线4008109000。
家庭安全摄像功能已停止。USB 存储设备只读。请关闭写保护后重试。
